channel.title: Posts on Enjoy in Málaga
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Enjoy in Málaga

item.title: The house
item.description:
Quiet 3-room flat with terrace and swimming pools placed in La Cala del Moral (Malaga) near the beach, perfect for enjoying the sun.

The house is ideal to spend a few days of holidays by the sea, it’s close to the capital and the beautiful villages of the Axarquia. A perfect place for couples, families with children …

item.title: The complex
item.description:
The flat is in a complex with garden, benches and 3 swimming pools:

  • 2 pools for adults
  • 1 pool for infants

Windows’ flat look inside the complex so you don’t have the noise of the road.
